# CMOdometerData

**Class**

A class that represents odometer data for workouts.

## Declaration

```swift
class CMOdometerData
```

## Overview

To get the measurements, use the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMOdometerData/speed] and [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMOdometerData/slope-96hlt] properties. To compute distances, use the [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMOdometerData/deltaDistance] and [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMOdometerData/deltaAltitude] properties.

## Getting speed and slope

- **speed**: The instantaneous velocity of the device, measured in meters per second.
- **slope**: The slope at the location toward the direction of travel, measured in degrees.
- **maxAbsSlope**: The maximum absolute slope at the location toward all directions, measured in degrees.

## Getting date and times

- **startDate**: The time that the device starts recording the odometer data.
- **endDate**: The time that the device stops recording the odometer data.
- **gpsDate**: The time of the GPS measurement associated with the location.

## Measuring distances

- **deltaDistance**: The change in distance that the user travels since the last location, measured in meters.
- **deltaAltitude**: The change in altitude above mean sea level associated with the location, measured in meters.

## Getting the location accuracy

- **speedAccuracy**: The accuracy of the speed value.
- **verticalAccuracy**: The validity of the altitude values and their estimated uncertainty, measured in meters.
- **deltaDistanceAccuracy**: The accuracy of the change in distance value.

## Getting the device

- **originDevice**: The device that measures the data.
- **CMOdometerOriginDevice**: The device that the odometer sample originates from.

## Pedometer and fitness

- **CMPedometer**: An object for fetching the system-generated live walking data.
- **CMPedometerData**: Information about the distance traveled by a user on foot.
- **CMPedometerEvent**: A change in the user’s pedestrian activity.
- **CMStepCounter**: The number of steps the user has taken with the device.
- **CMHighFrequencyHeartRateData**: A class that represents heart rate data collected at 1 Hz.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
